title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a separate pan, cook the pancetta until crisp.
Beat the eggs with the cheese and black pepper.
Combine the hot spaghetti with pancetta, then mix in the egg mixture off the heat.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and tikka spice for at least 1 hour.
Cook the onion in a pan until soft, add the marinated chicken.
Pour in the tomato sauce and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add cream, stir, and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
